mapper.insert: insert ignore into shoes.kick_screw_item(model_no, title, brand, product_type, gender, release_year, image, handle) value ( #{modelNo}, #{title}, #{brand}, #{productType}, #{gender}, #{releaseYear}, #{image}, #{handle} )
mapper.select: select model_no from shoes.kick_screw_item where release_year = #{releaseYear}
select pp.model_no as modelNo, ksi.handle as handle from poison_price pp inner join shoes.kick_screw_item ksi on pp.model_no = ksi.model_no group by pp.model_no limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
select pp.model_no as modelNo, ksi.handle as handle from poison_price pp inner join shoes.kick_screw_item ksi on pp.model_no = ksi.model_no group by pp.model_no
select count(*) from ( select count(*) from poison_price pp inner join shoes.kick_screw_item ksi on pp.model_no = ksi.model_no group by pp.model_no ) as pkc
select handle from kick_screw_item where model_no = #{modelNo}
